entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
